biography_text: O'HALLERAN, Thomas C., a Representative from Arizona; born in Chicago, Cook County, Ill., January 24, 1946; graduated from St. Mel High School, Chicago, Ill., 1964; attended Lewis University, Romeoville, Ill., 1965-1966; attended DePaul University, Chicago, Ill., 1991-1992; police officer, Chicago, Ill., 1966-1979; bond trader; business owner; member of the Arizona state house of representatives, 2001-2007; member of the Arizona state senate, 2007-2009; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
